transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Hello, Hi, is this Mr. Sharma?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Yes, speaking.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Yeah, hi, this is Ravi from ABC Solutions.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Do you have a minute?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: What's this about?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Well, we sell software. I mean, we are an IT solutions company and we thought you might be interested.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Are you looking to buy anything?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Not really.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: I'm busy right now, actually.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Oh, okay.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: But maybe, I mean, our product could save you money.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Probably.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: We could set a demo or something.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: What exactly does your product do?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Well, it does a lot of things. Helps with management, I think, and analytics.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Alice: Actually, I'm pretty new here, so I don't know all the details yet.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Look, this isn't a good time.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Maybe another time.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: sure I guess

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: can I call you tomorrow

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: I'll call you if I need something

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: bye
